channel.title: Products Changelog on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Products Changelog on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to HotelX API All notable changes in our platform will be documented on this page. 2019-05-02 Added search by legacy access codes in Hotel List. Added field filters in Hotel List Deprecate type in GeonameData 2019-03-07 Added CurrencyX management for the cancel penalties. Bug when the cancel penalty type is empty or invalid format.

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Insights-X 2019-04-11 Insights-X Content Benchmarck table daily_benchmarking_seller replaced by new ones benchmark tables Added buyer field in benchmark seller tables. Added seller field in benchmark buyer tables. 2019-03-27 New table daily_benchmarking_seller Insights-X Concepts 2019-02-21 New table effective_bookings_(buyer|seller) daily_insights table renamed as insights_daily_(buyer|seller) daily_insights_(client|provider) table renamed as insights_daily_(buyer|seller) 2019-02-07 Insights-X product documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Stats-X 2019-05-03 Fix an error that was causing that assets of HUB error types were NULL. 2019-05-02 Input field retrieveAssets made optional. false by default. 2019-04-30 New required input field retrieveAssets added to indicate if assets are needed. Assets returned limited to 100 to avoid too big responses. This limitation makes sense since the main objective is not to access all the asset nodes.

item.title: Products changelogs
